lines.text: Turns out that lonely people are all the same.
Lai Yiu-fai... we could start over.
Do you regret being with me?
Damn right I do! I had no regrets until I met you. Now my regrets could kill me.
I didn't see Chang, but I saw his family. I finally understood how he could be happy running around so free. It's because he has a place he can always return to.
